name: Fragments [Game Jam 2021]
description:
WELCOME TO FRAGMENTS

This was our first time participation in a Game Jam, the game has bugs and a lot of flaws to be fixed, but we are happy with the result in just 2 days.

In this little adventure, you will play as Kaori, a young man who is lost, he doesn't know where he is, now you have to help him to recover his soul which was fragmented. Can you help him?

You can check out our team and the game page here: Link
